_header: Blessing give them Jesu Christ That listeneth John Evangelist
Subjects: scripture texts, Engl. trans. of; translations
_description: ‘In principio in englissh’ (Gospel In die natalis ad altam missam) with a Prologue of ten lines

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Blessyng ȝif hem Ihesu cristþat lustneþ Ion þe
                    Ewangelist…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þat we mow come to his halleAmen Amen so sei we
                    alle
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
In die natalis domine ad altam missam / In principio erat verbum et
                        verbum erat (f. 171vb)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
Blessing ȝeue hem Ihesu Crist þat listeneþ Iohan þe
                    euangelistIn latyn hou he seiþ vs to þe spelle of In
                        principio…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…And þus endeþ þe In principio Ihesu graunte
                    vs reste & roþat we mote come to his halle Amen amen so seye we
                    alle

BLHar4196.First Lines: In þe begining was þe sunEuyn with his fader alway to won…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …We se him plainly in ilk placeffulfild of gudenes and of grace
BLHar4196.Note: Prologue lacking. Preceded by Latin, “IN principio erat uerbum & cetera.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Incipit hic secunda particula euangelii Ostensio diuinitis in christo In die natalis domini euangelium secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 16va)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Heuser,  Wilhelm. 
             “With an O and an I.” 
             Anglia
         27 (1904): 283-319: 297-300.
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
